name: Шерлок Холмс и доктор Ватсон: Убийство лорда Уотербрука
summary: In this little Russian animated gem Sherlock Holmes is investigating the strange circumstances concerning the murder of Lord Waterbrook. The parodies, jokes and twisted reality, which is a mark of Aleksandr Bubnov, makes this little short one of the funniest experiences in animation.
info:
• 中文名: 福尔摩斯与华生医生：沃特布鲁克勋爵谋杀案
  • 话数: 1
  • 别名: Sherlok Kholms i doktor Vatson
  • 别名: 福尔摩斯和华生医生 水流老爷之死
  • 别名: Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson: The Murder of Lord Waterbrook
  • 上映年度: 2005年
  • 片长: 19分钟
  • 导演: Александр Бубнов
